name: Brucea
details: Bark of Nux vomica or angustura falsa. Tetanic spasms with undisturbed consciousness, worse noise liquids, paralyzed lower extremities, worse least touch, CRIES FOR FEAR OF BEING TOUCHED. Painful jerking of legs; cramp-like pain in knees; rigid and lame limbs of paralytics. For pain in the passing of calculus.
